## What is a Remote Repository

* Remote Repositories
  + Versions of your project that are hosed on the Internet or network somewhere
  + Useful for collaborating with others who need to push/pull data when sharing work
  + Can be on a local machine


## Adding Remote Repositories

* Using the "git clone" command will implicitly add an origin remote
* To add a new remote Git repository
  + run `git remote add <shortname> <url>`
